description:

description:

description:

description:
The 2023 horror movie The Pope’s Exorcist is officially getting a sequel. The religious horror movie starred Russell Crowe as Gabriele Amorth, a character based on the real-life Catholic priest of the same name. Amorth was an exorcist for the Diocese of Rome, and he’s claimed to have performed tens of thousands of exorcisms. As [...]
